info.title: AOAI
info.description: This is a set of APIs that provides AI assistant features to generate social media marketing posts.

post.description: This gets the completion from the OpenAI API.
post.summary: Gets the completion from the OpenAI API

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: This specifies the locale to generate the completion. The default value is `en-us`.

parameters.name: social
parameters.description: This specifies the social media to generate the completion. The default value is `twitter`.

parameters.name: completionsPostRequest-2

schema.example: Generate a Facebook post promoting the Garage Hack event

parameters.description: The prompt to generate the completion.

200.description: This returns the completion generated from the OpenAI API.

500.description: This indicates the server is not working as expected.
